00020 
00021 /* Value Nodes */
00022 
00023 __device void svm_node_value_f(KernelGlobals *kg, ShaderData *sd, float *stack, uint ivalue, uint out_offset)
00024 {
00025     stack_store_float(stack, out_offset, __int_as_float(ivalue));
00026 }
00027 
00028 __device void svm_node_value_v(KernelGlobals *kg, ShaderData *sd, float *stack, uint out_offset, int *offset)
00029 {
00030     /* read extra data */
00031     uint4 node1 = read_node(kg, offset);
00032     float3 p = make_float3(__int_as_float(node1.y), __int_as_float(node1.z), __int_as_float(node1.w));
00033 
00034     stack_store_float3(stack, out_offset, p);
00035 }
00036
